channel.title: CVE Feed for The Tcpdump Group -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Tcpdump Group -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-8037|2024-08-04T09:48:25.625Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpdump
item.description: The ppp decapsulator in tcpdump 4.9.3 can be convinced to allocate a large amount of memory.

item.title: CVE-2021-41043|2024-08-04T02:59:31.062Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpslice
item.description: Use after free in tcpslice triggers AddressSanitizer, no other confirmed impact.

item.title: CVE-2020-8036|2024-08-04T09:48:24.824Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpdump
item.description: The tok2strbuf() function in tcpdump 4.10.0-PRE-GIT was used by the SOME/IP dissector in an unsafe way.

item.title: CVE-2024-2397|2024-08-01T19:11:53.569Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpdump
item.description: Due to a bug in packet data buffers management, the PPP printer in tcpdump can enter an infinite loop when reading a crafted DLT_PPP_SERIAL .pcap savefile. This problem does not affect any tcpdump release, but it affected the git master branch from 2023-06-05 to 2024-03-21.

item.title: CVE-2024-2397|2024-04-12T13:22:01.636Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpdump
item.description: Due to a bug in packet data buffers management, the PPP printer in tcpdump can enter an infinite loop when reading a crafted DLT_PPP_SERIAL .pcap savefile. This problem does not affect any tcpdump release, but it affected the git master branch from 2023-06-05 to 2024-03-21.

item.title: CVE-2024-2397|2024-07-31T17:39:31.449Z -- the%20tcpdump%20group -- tcpdump
item.description: Due to a bug in packet data buffers management, the PPP printer in tcpdump can enter an infinite loop when reading a crafted DLT_PPP_SERIAL .pcap savefile. This problem does not affect any tcpdump release, but it affected the git master branch from 2023-06-05 to 2024-03-21.
